title: We need more battle bunny skins
body:
I wonder for a while why Riven is the single champions with a skin from that series, i mean even supreme skins like pulsefire have a set of skins for multiple champions, so, a lot of skins themes are shared to multiple different champs, but battle bunny is unique, is that cause it may have a sexual theme?! 
Anyway i looked into champions and there is a list with everyone that can fit that thematic skin, or at least the best ones:
**1.** Irelia (most of her skins can't be bought tho so there arent many choices for a new irelia player, a new skin on her would solve it, plus her thiccness fit perfect for battle bunny)
**2.** Lux (she really needs a new skin anyway)
**3. **~~Teemo~~ but he alerdy have a bunny skin so lets exclude him from list.
**4.** Syndra (she dont have to many skins, and just imagine throwing some carrots to kill you, its really funny tho)
**5.** Draven (cause we need some Draven, a battle bunny skin is exactly what he needs to attract all eyes on him and get all the attention)
**6.** ~~Zoe~~ i dont want to be in jail so lets remove this one
**7.** Caitlyn (it's caitlyn)
**8. **Ivern (riot anyway said they want to give him a skin)

The problem might be marketing these skins. With skins like KDA, a small animation usually gets some people into the game, along with showing more people that you can buy them. With the battle bunny skin line, it might be harder to market because . . . . . . you probably understand.

i seen ads for local taxi with a lot of sexual thematic..  i regret seeing it, but i did.. Anyway the point is that wouldn't be really something so hard to do, they dont need to release an musical video or a high tier animation, most skins are released with small jokes which highlist the skin and their animations/recalls, but yeah i understand what you are talking about.
cottontail zoe ;(
